content.p: The FSSIDS 2022 Conference will be held at The Everly Hotel, Putrajaya. By flight The nearest airports (about 35km) are the Kuala Lumpur International Airport (KLIA) 1 and KLIA 2. From the airports, get a taxi or airport limo straight to the venue. Alternatively, hop on the KLIA Transit ERL to get to Putrajaya and continue with a taxi or e-hailing to the venue. By train The nearest train stations (about 10km) are the ‘KLIA Transit Putrajaya & Cyberjaya Station’ with KLIA Transit ERL and station ‘Putrajaya Sentral’ with MRT Putrajaya Line. From the station, get a taxi or e-hailing to the venue. By car, taxi or e-hailing services About 35 minutes from KLIA airports and Kuala Lumpur city centre. From KLIA 1 and 2 From Kuala Lumpur City Centre telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001 email: enquiries@nottingham.edu.my
